plugins.author: lprot
plugins.title: SHOUTcast
plugins.synopsis: SHOUTcast Radio - Listen to Free Online Radio Stations
plugins.description:
SHOUTcast Radio - Listen to Free Online Radio Stations

For more information, visit http://www.shoutcast.com

plugins.author: Henrik Andersson, lprot
plugins.title: SomaFM
plugins.synopsis: Over 30 unique channels of listener-supported, commercial-free, underground/alternative radio broadcasting to the world. All music hand-picked by SomaFM's award-winning DJs and music directors.
plugins.description:
SomaFM

Over 30 unique channels of listener-supported, commercial-free, underground/alternative radio broadcasting to the world. All music hand-picked by SomaFM's award-winning DJs and music directors.

For more information, visit http://somafm.com

plugins.author: F0R3V3R50F7
plugins.title: Streamian (Uninstall vuePRO to use)
plugins.synopsis: One - Stop for Shows, Movies & TV with Personal Library & Subtitle Plugin Support.
plugins.description:
Scrapes:

* 1337x

* Internet Archive

* YTS

* EZTV

* i.mjh.nz

* Apsattv

(Uninstall vuePRO to use)

plugins.author: F0R3V3R50F7
plugins.title: Invidious
plugins.synopsis: Search & Stream Videos / Music from Invidious
plugins.description:
Changelog (15/06/24):

* Randomized Sub Feed.

* Added Menu Options for 'Check for New Releases' to Save Resources.

* Lowered Default Recommendation Value (Subscription feed added to compensate).

* Improved Loading Statements.

plugins.author: Andreas Smas, Superfan
plugins.title: Opensubtitles
plugins.description: Installing this plugin will make Movian automatically search for subtitles online at opensubtitles.com when playing a movie

plugins.author: nikkpap
plugins.title: Gr & Eng OSK
plugins.synopsis: Greek and English OSK interface for Movian.
plugins.description: This plugin installs on Movian, Greek and English OSK interface.

plugins.author: F0R3V3R50F7
plugins.title: Internet Archive
plugins.synopsis: Search, Save & Stream Videos & Audio from Archive.org
plugins.description:
Changelog (27/05/24):

* Fixed Favorites Appending Oldest to Newest.

* Added Page Header Icon (Archive.org Logo).

* Added Warning Messages About Retricted Files.

* Fixed File Names Including the Folder Title.

* Added Donation Prompt for Archive.org Team.
